title: Lol running badly after win10 anniversary update
body: So before the Win10 anniversary update lol was working fine with fps around 120 now after the update the fps almost stays glued to 60. The highest I've had since the update was 61 and it drops to 30 for a couple of seconds inbeetwen games. Any solutions, thoughts, advice?

replies.body:
^ This is the problem more than likely OP.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7YAkdOeT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-08T20:23:54.909+0000)
>
> Some players have been experiencing a freeze after a recent Windows 10 Update.  The culprit appears to be the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disabling that should get this fixed!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/7YAkdOeT-crash-or-what?comment=0000

Your drivers may have become outdated with the recent update.  Go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your PC and get back in game!  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2V7tXjGg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-09T17:02:47.169+0000)
>
> Your drivers may have become outdated with the recent update.  Go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your PC and get back in game!  Let me know if you have any questions!

Well I've heard that this might have been the problem but when I check out my drivers they appear to be up to date...?

It's good to hear that they're up to date.  There could still be other issues like bad game files, settings, or even hardware.  Go through each step in the FPS guide to rule out any possibilities.  Let me know the results!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2V7tXjGg,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-09T21:23:16.828+0000)
>
> It's to hear that they're up to date.  There could still be other issues like bad game files, settings, or even hardware.  Go through each step in the FPS guide to rule out any possibilities.  Let me know the results!

So I have tried everything on the list and lowering the video settings did help but the fps got only up to 90-95 which is kind of disappointing since I had 120 fps with medium high settings instead of low...
just buy a new computer and reinstall everything. and also change your internet company tyty

> [{quoted}](name=foraminifera,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2V7tXjGg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-09T17:32:13.414+0000)
>
> just buy a new computer and reinstall everything. and also change your internet company tyty

Yeah very funny!
